column1: '''Jason Fisher''' is an American independent scholar specializing in [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
column3: and Medieval Germanic philology. He runs the blog ''Lingwë - Musings of a Fish''.

column2: the monthly bulletin of the [[Mythopoeic Society]]
